definitions.definition: to cause something, especially a problem or difficulty:
examples: Nuclear weapons pose a threat to everyone.

definitions.definition: a particular position in which a person stands, sits, etc. in order to be photographed, painted, etc.:
examples: He adopted/assumed/struck (= moved into) an elegant pose.

definitions.definition: an occasion when someone pretends to have qualities that they do not have:
examples: She likes to appear as if she knows all about the latest films and art exhibitions, but it's all a pose (= she's pretending and it's not true).
